prompt:

Subtitles to process:

  {
    "start": "00:01:22,938",
    "end": "00:01:25,738",

    "text": "팥 mathematicsomorphization"
  },
  {
    "start": "00:01:25,738",
    "end": "00:01:25,978",
    "lang": "en",

  }
]

Output JSON format only:
```json

  {

  }
]
```

response.ja: 彼女の道を救うために
